data.description:
DETERMINING AVAILABLE WELLSPRINGS

During each scene, your surroundings grant you two different wellsprings. (See @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.JHjzGHXO9qm8HVW9]{Invoker Rules})
When you perform an invocation, choose one option you have access to, then apply its effects to one creature you can see.

basic.name: Aero Blast
basic.description:
You deal 20 air damage to the target.

You Spend: @LOSS[5 mp]
Target Suffers: @DMG[&step(20,25,30) air]{Air Damage} or @DMG[&step(20,25,30)+&sl('wellspring-expansion') air]{Wellspring Expansion Air Damage}

advanced.name: Aero Hex
advanced.description:
Until the start of your next turn, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal bolt and fire damage.

You Spend: @LOSS[5 mp]
Target Suffers: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.gLmFM7sGvsT3YEEQ]{Effect: Aero Hex}

superior1.name: Breeze
superior1.description:
The target recovers 30 Hit Points.

You Spend: @LOSS[5 mp]
Target Recovers: @GAIN[&step(30,40,50) hp]{Recover HP} or @GAIN[&step(30,40,50)+(&sl('elemental-harmony')*5) hp]{Recover Elemental Harmony HP}

superior2.name: Twister
superior2.description:
The target suffers 10 air and also suffers dazed.

You Spend: @LOSS[5 mp]
Target Suffers: @DMG[&step(10,15,20) air]{Air Damage} or @DMG[&step(10,15,20)+&sl('wellspring-expansion') air]{Wellspring Expansion Air Damage}
Target Suffers: @EFFECT[dazed]
